short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find matching Alibaba suppliers by simply right-clicking on any image for instant sourcing options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Alibaba Supplier Finder by Image - Streamline Your Supplier Search

Find suppliers on Alibaba using images from any website with just a click.

The Alibaba Supplier Finder by Image Chrome extension simplifies the supplier search process by allowing users to search for suppliers on Alibaba using product images from any website. This tool enhances your sourcing workflow, saving time and helping you keep track of your supplier searches efficiently.

🎯 Features:

🔍 Automatic Supplier Search:
Quickly search for suppliers on Alibaba using images from across the web. A lot of time, hover-effects won't work. Try to click on the image to "open" it and then right click on it, in order to see the alibaba-search-option in your context-menu.

📊 Real-Time Price Overview:
View and compare prices from different suppliers in real-time as you browse various online platforms.

📂 Save and Organize Searches:
Easily save and organize your supplier searches and notes for future reference into your personal supplier lookup dashboard.

🔐 Privacy First:
Your search data is stored locally on your device — no information is saved on external servers.

🖥️ Seamless Browser Integration:
Integrates smoothly into your browser for a streamlined experience.

Disclaimer: This extension is developed independently and is not affiliated with Alibaba or any other platforms. The software may occasionally contain errors. Please use the data as a guideline and verify critical information independently.

___________________________________________

Current Release Notes:
🛠️ Some websites may have limitations with the image-based search feature.
🛠️ If images on a webpage only appear on hover, try clicking on the image first before right-clicking to use the supplier lookup.
